T2w-TSE.description: T2-weighted turbo spin echo structural image

rules.name: Temporal Volume Count
rules.description: Validates that the fMRI acquisition has exactly 156 temporal volumes (unique TriggerTime values).
rules.implementation:
trigger_times = value["TriggerTime"].dropna().unique()
expected_volumes = 156

if len(trigger_times) != expected_volumes:
    raise ValidationError(f"Expected {expected_volumes} temporal volumes, but found {len(trigger_times)}.")

rules.name: Uniform Temporal Spacing
rules.description: Validates that TriggerTime values are uniformly spaced according to the RepetitionTime (TR).
rules.implementation:
trigger_times = value["TriggerTime"].dropna().sort_values()
tr = value["RepetitionTime"].iloc[0]

# Calculate spacing between consecutive trigger times
spacings = trigger_times.diff().dropna()

# Check if all spacings match TR (within small tolerance for floating point)
tolerance = 1  # 1ms tolerance
non_uniform = spacings[abs(spacings - tr) > tolerance]

if len(non_uniform) > 0:
    raise ValidationError(f"TriggerTime spacing should be {tr}ms (TR), but found non-uniform gaps: {non_uniform.values[:5]}...")

B0-FieldMap-HighRes.description: B0 field map for distortion correction (high resolution)

B0-FieldMap-SENSE.description: B0 field map for distortion correction (SENSE accelerated)
